text: Zhang Changyun (born 9 April 1964) is a Chinese cross-country skier. She competed in the women's 10 kilometres at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of China Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Skiers from Jilin
title: Zhang Changyun
